subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: In soccer there are certain situations in which it is better to commit a foul rather than give an opponent a chance to score.  But when, exactly, is the right time to incur the referee's wrath?
snippet: In soccer there are certain situations in which it is better to commit a foul rather than give an opponent a chance to score.  But when, exactly, is the right time to incur the referee's wrath?
